channel.title: Help me?
channel.description: I downloaded a server called Acid Blitz.But i want to add new items to the shop how do i do that?

item.title: Help me?
item.dc:creator: @hootywooty hootywooty
item.description:
@hootywooty wrote:

open up your shops.cfg. In shops.cfg should see simaliar codes to this at the top

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

under that you will see shop = 1. At the end of the last item in the shop press tab and enter in amount you want in shop press tab and then type in the items id

Read full topic
